alert.note: Alert for Delta (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 16 at 11:38AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Delta, Fannin, Hopkins, Hunt, Lamar and Rains Counties. * WHEN...Until 200 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. River or stream flows are elevated. Ponding of water on roadways is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Greenville, Paris, Sulphur Springs, Bonham, Commerce, Royse City, Farmersville, Reno, Leonard, Cooper, Honey Grove, Whitewright, West Tawakoni, Blossom, Wolfe City, Quinlan, Caddo Mills, Emory, East Tawakoni and Savoy.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
